constraints.description: Output uses a numbered list with three items.
Exactly three distinct benefits are provided.
constraints.evidence: Three distinct benefits: temperature regulation, joint lubrication, cognitive performance.

constraints.description: Must not mention skin health or dermatological effects.
Benefits are not redundant or rephrased duplicates.
constraints.evidence: Each item addresses a different domain (thermoregulation, joints, cognition).

constraints.description: Each item is internally coherent and relevant to the prompt.
constraints.evidence: Each item explains a plausible hydration-related benefit.

notes: Canonical stable reference output for prompt p0001.
